short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search cards on CardMarket or TCGPlayer and get quick access to Meta Decks, DBS Decks main page and Shenron's Lair DB.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Put the card name on the search bar and press Enter and you will be redirected to CardMarket (EU) or TCGPlayer (USA/CA/NZ/AU).

Press the DBS DECKS and META to access the dbs-decks.com homepage and meta page.
Press the SHENRON'S LAIR DB button to access the card database.
